A children's book about a zebra who discovers the beauty of its own unique rainbow-colored stripes and learns to embrace them.
A colorful and whimsical animation short film featuring a group of rainbow-colored zebras who embark on a journey to find their place in the world.
A virtual reality experience that transports users to a world where zebras are the dominant species and their rainbow-colored stripes are the norm.
A mobile game where players must help a rainbow-colored zebra navigate through a world full of challenges and obstacles whileing its stripes.
A fashion line featuring clothing and accessories inspired by the rainbow-colored stripes of zebras, with a focus on individuality and self-expression.
